mn126:3.8: kiṁvādī → kiṁvādī kiṁdiṭṭhi (cck); kiṁvādī kiṁdiṭṭhī (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn126:5.1: muddhānaṁ → buddhānaṁ (mr) | satthā evaṁvādī → evaṁvādī evaṁdiṭṭhi (cck); evaṁvādī evaṁdiṭṭhī (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn126:13.1: abhimantheyya → abhimattheyya (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr) | aggitthiko → aggatthiko (bj)
